医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
一种针对肺炎衣原体胞外蛋白的新型多表位疫苗研究人员利用免疫信息学设计并评估了一种针对肺炎衣原体主要外膜蛋白的多表位疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/A-novel-multi-epitope-vaccine-targeting-extracellular- Proteins-of-Chlamydia-pneumoniae.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/A-novel-multi-epitope-vaccine-targeting-extracellular- Proteins-of-Chlamydia-pneumoniae.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a04b23c6-50c4-44e8-918e-5fc511ee5f0c Thu, 14 Sep 2023 08:12:00 -0400 A novel multi-epitope vaccine targeting extracellular proteins of Chlamydia pneumoniae
蒲公英提取物对乳腺癌细胞的抗转移和抗增殖作用研究人员评估了全反式视黄酸 (ATRA) 和蒲公英提取物在乳腺癌细胞中的抗转移和抗增殖特性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/The-anti-metastatic-and-anti-proliferation-impact-of-dandelion-extract-on-breast-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/The-anti-metastatic-and-anti-proliferation-impact-of-dandelion-extract-on-breast-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52ec007c-d50a-40dc-abed-bcf23cff5853 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 08:06:00 -0400 The anti-metastatic and anti-proliferation impact of dandelion extract on breast cancer cells
卡介苗疫苗接种预防复发性唇疱疹的巢式随机对照试验结果研究人员检查了卡介苗（BCG）疫苗接种对减少唇疱疹（唇疱疹）复发的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Results-from-a-nested-randomized-control-trial-for-BCG-vaccination-against-recurrent-herpes-labialis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Results-from-a-nested-randomized-control-trial-for-BCG-vaccination-against-recurrent-herpes-labialis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79bca7e4-70bd-4dfb-baad-a80ac5fbb5d5 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 07:59:00 -0400 Results from a nested randomized controlled trial for BCG vaccination against recurrent herpes labialis
利用深度学习提高急诊室死亡率预测的准确性研究人员通过采用先进的数据合成技术和机器学习模型，提高了急诊科死亡率预测的准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Utilizing-deep-learning-to-enhance-the-accuracy-of-mortality-forecasts-in-emergency-rooms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Utilizing-deep-learning-to-enhance-the-accuracy-of-mortality-forecasts-in-emergency-rooms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b7360c6-98a5-41da-8fc4-b23b6230af2b Thu, 14 Sep 2023 07:52:00 -0400 Utilizing deep learning to enhance the accuracy of mortality forecasts in emergency rooms
随着越来越多的患者给医生发送电子邮件，卫生系统开始收费患有癌症和与癌症相关的心脏病的梅格·贝克韦尔（Meg Bakewell）有时会在出现疼痛或呼吸急促等紧急症状时向她的初级保健医生、肿瘤科医生和心脏病专家发送电子邮件，寻求医疗建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/As-more-病人-email-doctors-health-systems-start-charging-fees.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/As-more-病人-email-doctors-health-systems-start-charging-fees.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f40c837-d15e-403a-8971-e60d4475dc85 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 06:49:42 -0400 As more patients email doctors, health systems start charging fees
堕胎禁令导致前往伊利诺伊州医院的高危患者人数增加当她怀孕22周左右时，患者发现她所怀的儿子没有肾脏，肺部也无法发育。如果他在出生后幸存下来，他将呼吸困难并在数小时内死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Abortion-bans-fuel-a-rise-in-high-risk-病人-heading-to-Illinois-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Abortion-bans-fuel-a-rise-in-high-risk-病人-heading-to-Illinois-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d70001f-20e7-4f95-8cfd-1332c05313e8 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 06:48:48 -0400 Abortion bans fuel a rise in high-risk patients heading to Illinois hospitals
ELRIG 英国成立参与战略工作组英国欧洲实验室研究与创新小组 (ELRIG) 今天宣布成立其参与战略工作组 (ESWG)。该组织旨在改善科学项目的获取并发展 ELRIG 社区https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/ELRIG-UK-Establishes-Engagement-Strategy-Work-Group.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/ELRIG-UK-Establishes-Engagement-Strategy-Work-Group.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c548d59a-9d48-45ad-b77f-c3bfd341c9b1 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 05:11:00 -0400
灵活的空间生物学解决方案，可在两天内实现高达 8 重的扩增：CST 推出 SignalStar™ 多重 IHC Cell Signaling Technology (CST) 是一家生命科学发现技术公司，也是抗体、试剂盒和服务的领先供应商，今天宣布推出其 SignalStar Multiplex IHC 技术，这是一种革命性的新工具，用于空间生物学研究，使用中重、高通量进行空间生物学研究。通量免疫组织化学 (IHC) 测定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Flexible-Spatial-Biology-Solution-for-Up-to-8-Plex-Amplification-in-Two-Days-CST-Launches-SignalStare284a2-Multiplex-免疫组织化学.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Flexible-Spatial-Biology-Solution-for-Up-to-8-Plex-Amplification-in-Two-Days-CST-Launches-SignalStare284a2-Multiplex- IHC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f81b0b9-d2f6-4bce-8b1f-12cc0e9877fc Thu, 14 Sep 2023 04:18:00 -0400 Flexible Spatial Biology Solution for Up to 8-Plex Amplification in Two Days: CST Launches SignalStar™ Multiplex IHC
Omicron 感染后长期感染新冠病毒 (COVID-19) 的风险显着降低感染 Omicron 变种后患上长期新冠病毒的风险明显低于感染早期冠状病毒变种后的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Long-COVID-risk-found-to-be-significantly-lower-following-Omicron-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Long-COVID-risk-found-to-be-significantly-lower-following-Omicron-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13275221-f449-459b-9992-673bcd1873bb Wed, 13 Sep 2023 23:56:00 -0400 Long COVID risk found to be significantly lower following Omicron infection
AACR 癌症进展报告提供癌症研究和治疗的最新统计数据今天，美国癌症研究协会 (AACR) 发布了第 13 版年度癌症进展报告，该报告记录了基础、转化和临床癌症研究以及与癌症相关的人口科学如何在国家研究所的联邦投资的支持下进行卫生署 (NIH) 和国家癌症研究所 (NCI) - 对于改善健康和拯救生命仍然至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/AACR-Cancer-Progress-Report-provides-latest-statistics-on-cancer-research-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/AACR-Cancer-Progress-Report-provides-latest-statistics-on-cancer-research-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a732f6e-71e8-4da5-8fd1-50dfa7811105 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 23:50:00 -0400 AACR Cancer Progress Report provides latest statistics on cancer research and treatment
